casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Devozeo Demontra PERSON. No. 620A07. Supreme Court of North Carolina. January 3, 2008. Julie Ramseur Lewis, Assistant Public Defender, Peter S. Gilchrist, III, District Attorney, for State of NC.

Prior report: ___ N.C.App. ___, 653 S.E.2d 560.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 3rd day of January 2008 by State of NC for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 3rd day of January 2008."
